### Asphalt Parking Lot Resurfacing Tender

#### Invitation to Bid

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the resurfacing of an asphalt parking lot. The project will consist of resurfacing the existing asphalt parking lot within a 16-week timeframe after contract award.

#### Key Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4032162715-Doc4032261565
* **Closing Date and Time:** July 11, 2023 at 14:00 (2:00 PM)
* **Project Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Bidding Requirements

* Only one bid will be accepted from each contractor.
* All bids must be submitted electronically through the CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) platform.
* Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Conditions of Bidding

* All participating contractors must register on the CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) platform prior to bidding.
* The bidding process will be conducted in English and French, and all proposals must be submitted in one of these languages.
* Non-Canadian companies must register with Canada Buys within 10 days of submitting a bid.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this bid, please contact Nabil Boujenoui, Contracting Authority, at nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Website Link

Please access the bid solicitation through the following website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16447603?extsite=MTY0NDc2MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Important Note

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a competitive open-bidding process. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.
